title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 369-3.2 - Eligible projects
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 369-3.2 - Eligible projects

State Regulations

Eligible projects for State assistance under this Subpart
include planning, educational and promotional activities to increase public
awareness of and participation in waste reduction and recycling. Projects may
include salary and fringe benefit costs for recycling coordination, publications, education and outreach for recycling and waste
reduction. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
